item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [Global][Databases] - MongoDB upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 16, 01:00 UTC  -  Mar 26, 23:00 UTC

Jan 30, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for business and enterprise plans, a small downtime may be experienced for essential plans (less than 15mn).
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of our MongoDB offer.

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 15, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/02/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 15/02/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode. They will also be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

item.title: [GRA][Managed Private Registry] - Kube-proxy
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 9, 13:30 - 16:30 UTC

Feb 8, 00:29 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/02/2023 13:30 UTC
End time : 09/02/2023 16:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy and to following all last features deployed K8s services, we will migrate Kube-Proxy to a more performant implementation.

item.title: [UK1][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
Feb 9, 13:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 8, 23:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/02/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 09/02/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of UK1 will be unreachable for 5 minutes
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will migrate Mistral to a new production platform

item.title: [Global][Public Cloud] - Vrack
item.description:
Feb 9, 10:24 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/02/2023 09:48 UTC
End Time : 09/02/2023 10:24 UTC
Root cause : Due to operations on this Maintenace the creation of new instance on the vrack was unvailable.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
